summary: It’s all buying and selling for the sake of buying and selling
title: Jack Dorsey’s First-Tweet NFT, Listed at $48 Million, Has Lost 99% Of Its Value
detailed_content: When crypto entrepreneur Sina Estavi purchased the NFT of Twitter’s co-founder Jack Dorsey’s first-ever tweet back in March 2021 for a staggering $2.9 million, the world was divided into two groups.
author: Stephen Moore
